lore:
Your first task on the road to staying alive,
Is showing that two plus three equals five.
But I'll be impressed if your function predicts,
Two hundred and twelve plus three hundred and six.
title: The first hurdle

instructions: In this activity you will be writing code to create a function that returns an arrary of even numbers from 0 to a given number.
title: Double Trouble

instructions: Write code to return an array with all numbers from 'num' to 0
title: Third Times the Charm?
